projects.name: NebulaPay
projects.tagline: NebulaPay is a Secure Conversational Payment ChatBot

metadata.title: Idea
metadata.details: To allow both banked and unbanked Nigerians seamlessly carry out financial transactions and payments across different banking platforms and from convieniently from their social media accounts. NebulaPay is currently available on Messenger and on Skype

metadata.title: Idea
metadata.details: ViraSpring is a tool that helps vendors get new customers everyday by allowing vendors advertise for FREE and the adverts are promoted by other vendors to their followers on different social networks

projects.name: TestOnion
projects.tagline: Online testing platform for scheduling tests and grading candidates

metadata.title: Idea
metadata.details: Online testing platform that lets organisations schedule test for candidates and share links to candidates who can take the scheduled test from anywhere. The tests are graded instantly and Organisations can see the results in real time.

projects.name: Payperless
projects.tagline: Payperless is an online payment service provider that helps merchants receive payments online.

metadata.title: Idea
metadata.details: Payperless helps merchants easily recieve payments online through a simple and unique payment link. Merchants can also create and keep track of invoices and payments

projects.categories: Webapp, Online Payment, MERN App, Invoicing

projects.name: QWRY Games
projects.tagline: An online suite of word and dictionary games (PWA)

metadata.title: Idea
metadata.details: QWRY Games is an online collection of word games. It is a Progressive Web App that is installable and works even when offline.
